features: Summer’s Eve Simply Sensitive Daily Gentle Feminine Wash removes odor-causing bacteria
The micellar water formula creates a gentle cleansing intimate care and feminine body wash that’s clinically tested for sensitive skin
Simply Sensitive is a subtly floral fragrance for a barely there impression and gentle enough for your most delicate skin; under your arms, breasts, and even in your intimate area
Summer’s Eve daily gentle feminine wash is gynecologist tested, free from dyes and parabens, and the product is not tested on animals
Uniquely formulated and pH balanced to match the intimate area’s natural chemistry
body.description: Experience a gentle kind of cleansing with micellar water for your intimate area. A clean experience that isn't complicated and overdone. A daily intimate care routine that lets you experience that unique everyday Summer’s Eve readiness. Summer's Eve feminine body wash is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Uniquely formulated and pH-balanced to match your body's natural chemistry. All Summer's Eve feminine hygiene products are gynecologist tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin. That’s why millions of women trust our expansive range of gynecologist-tested cleansing and care. Our wide variety of products are made for everybody – whether you’re at home or on the go, want to bask in fragrant lusciousness or no scent at all or want ultra-gentle or high performance. With every Summer’s Eve product you use, know that We See You, We Get You, We Got You. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Micellar Water Formula 2 Clinically Tested 3 Gynecologist Tested 4 pH-Balanced 5 Free From Dyes & Parabens

Summer's Eve Gentle Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Sensitive Skin Free from Parabens Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Sensitive Skin Free from Parabens

What is unique about Summer's Eve Gentle Collection? Our Gentle Collection caters to those with want extra gentle products with light to no fragrances. The products in this Collection include our Simply Sensitive and Fragrance Free lines and are designed to have the gentlest touch. Why does pH matter? It's important to your body’s natural defense and maintaining a good environment for a healthy external vaginal area. The pH of ordinary soap, can be very basic (high pH) and may not complement the natural pH range of your external vaginal area. Isn’t Summer’s Eve and Fem Care just if you have a problem? I don’t have an issue “down there” … The external vaginal area is different than other parts of your body – its delicate, and has a different pH than other areas of the body – and so it needs a different kind of care. What can I do if I experience vaginal itching? If you are experiencing vaginal itching, we recommend you talk with your doctor or healthcare professional about your symptoms. If you know that you have a yeast infection, you can find relief with one of our Monistat products.

reviews.reviewText: I really like this wash agent. It is very gentle on my private areas but also cleanses well. I’ve been interested in perhaps trying other scents but am hesitant about potential irritation so I’ll likely stick with this for now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. Very gentle with a fresh no-perfume smell.My only issue is that the product leaked a little in shipping. All three bottles were bound together with a plastic wrap but because the lids are a little loose the bottles were a little sticky when I unpacked them. No significant product loss. I just had to rinde the bottles before putting them away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this product for over 2 years now and it has never disappointed me. The best part of this product is that it lets the vaginal area maintain its natural pH level and still keeps the area clean and odour free
Does as advertised, very gentle and at a good price for a feminine product.
